channel.title: VendettaScape (Brand new) VPS Hosted Updated!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MQqY3JE.png[/img]
[center][size=10pt][u][b]Vendettascape Key Features[/b][/u][/size]
[size=10pt][u][b] Downloadable client[/b][/u][/size] [ftp=ftp://mega.co.nz/#!X5gDmBYQ!kbHl31tl8WPnQdqEL5YWc-S7z5OGph6jf757sdxcLTw]https://mega.co.nz/#!X5gDmBYQ!kbHl31tl8WPnQdqEL5YWc-S7z5OGph6jf757sdxcLTw[/ftp] updated
[size=10pt][b][u]Forums[/u][/b][/size] [url=http://www.vendettascape.com]www.vendettascape.com[/url]
[size=10pt]Webclient[/size] [url=http://warrock.netau.net/webclient.html]http://warrock.netau.net/webclient.html[/url]
-VPS hosted server for maximum uptime
-Mature and handpicked staff (people who ask will halve their chance of becoming part of the team)
-Altered locations for diffrent skills (EG Thieving,fishing ETC)
-Bug fixes are still being found and fixed
-Various pre default bosses such as KBD,Chaos Elemental and more to come!
-Mall area with upcoming shops
-level point system where the player can cash out his earnt levels for some nice items
-Yell functions exclusive for each rank
-Different types of ranks such as Guide,Extreme Donator,Donator and a few more to come
-Monthly Drop Parties packed full of various items
-Custom items (torva,pernix,celestial,corrupted etc)
-A skill system which isnt too hard nor easy to achieve level 99 in various skills which makes it very balanced
-Donator only items/Benefits/area (in development) donators will also recieve random items upon subscribing and will recieve other items every 2 months
-different training teleports which are tuned to the users level EG 0-20 20-60 60-90 etc
-various events where reguler players can win donator status for a month (paying for donator status is permenant)
-602+ cache for better and more smoother gameplay [/center]
SEE YOU IN GAME!
Upon joining the player will recieve a strange box to open to test their luck!
image index-
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bxME2O5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XDIJHs1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LOj2r0P.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6lKYOhn.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RxFTAuS.jpg[/img]
[center][size=10pt][size=10pt]NEW FEATURES[/size][/size][/center] -Exclusive boxes hidden within different monsters which have a variety of items to obtain! (low tier to high tier)
-Crystal chest with various different items...can obtain the pieces by the monsters throughout the game!
